item.title: LoR Meta Index (LMI) expansion by using Bo3 data
item.dc:creator: Valentino (Legna) Vazzoler
item.description: The LMI is limited in its current setting as it uses only playrates and win-rates. By using Bo3 data we propose a way to expand the LMI with a ban-index
